mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( 0, #{strNoticeTitle}, #{strNoticeDate}, #{strNoticeContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq, NOTICE_TITLE AS strNoticeTitle, NOTICE_DATE AS strNoticeDate, NOTICE_CONTENT AS strNoticeContent FROM NOTICE WHERE 1 = 1 AND NOTICE_SEQ = #{id}
SELECT NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq, NOTICE_TITLE AS strNoticeTitle, NOTICE_DATE AS strNoticeDate, NOTICE_CONTENT AS strNoticeContent FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq, NOTICE_TITLE AS strNoticeTitle, NOTICE_DATE AS strNoticeDate FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( INQUIRY_SEQ, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_BODY, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_EMAIL, USER_ID ) VALUES ( 0, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryBody}, #{inquiryDate}, #{inquiryEmail}, #{userId} )
